hypso.plot.map.auto_adjust_img(img)

Adjust image contrast using histogram equalization.

Args:

img: Image to adjust.

Returns:

Adjusted image.

hypso.plot.map.get_rgb(sat_obj)

Write the RGB image.

Args:

path_to_save (str): The path to save the RGB image. R_wl (float, optional): The wavelength for the red channel. Defaults to 650. G_wl (float, optional): The wavelength for the green channel. Defaults to 550. B_wl (float, optional): The wavelength for the blue channel. Defaults to 450. :param sat_obj:

Return type:

PIL.Image
